Class ParameterLearning

extends java.lang.Object

      • calcProb

        private double calcProb(int[] data_t0,
                        int node,
                        int value)
        Calculates the prob of a node in t=1 having a value given the t=0 values.
        Parameters:
        data_t0 - - t=0 nodes value
        node - - node t+1
        value - - value of the node
        Returns:
        the double

      • calcProbAux

        private double calcProbAux(int[] data,
                           int node,
                           int nodes_remaining)
        Calc prob aux. Recursion Function to walk the three. Stop condition is next node being a leaf
        Parameters:
        data - - the value of the nodes (the value for the node corresponding to the node where this function is stoping by is changed)
        node - - node t+1 to calcProb
        nodes_remaining - - number of node until leaf
        Returns:
        the double

      • calcProbNode

        private double calcProbNode(int[] data,
                            int node)
        Calculates the prob of a node t=1 having a value given all the information (values of t=0 and t=1).
        Parameters:
        data - - values of t and t+1
        node - - node
        Returns:
        prob
